Name: Green Destiny
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber and kiwi in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Looks green and even tastes green, but pleasantly so.
History: Created in 2001 by Andrew Tiunos at Hakk in Warsaw, Poland.
